todos.content: Analyze the design reference files from para estilos directory and understand the design requirements
Start the development server and verify the current application functionality
Map the design requirements to the current application structure
Create a comprehensive refactoring plan for the entire application
Refactor the main layout with the dark theme and navigation bar as shown in the mockups
Update the POS page to match the design specifications
Refactor other pages (reports, transfers, etc.) to match the design system
Implement proper Supabase integration with loading/error states
Test the refactored application to ensure functionality matches the design
